name: Pull (Verdant Air Studios)
description:
Pull is a 2.5D minimalist, colorful and short puzzle-platformer with an emphasis on using a grappling hook. Grapple the blue blocks and ride elevators as you make it your goal to reach the golden cube at the end. Be careful, and get the fastest time you possibly can!

This game can also be played with a PS4 controller.

PS4 controls:

Left/right: Move
Square button: Grapple

Freesound.org credits: n_audioman and nicolas77
